basics.name: Koteswar Rao Meesala
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a software developer currently pursuing my Masters in Software Engineering at UHCL. I like the way technology solves many problems and I am passionate and excited to increase my exposure to this arsenal of technologies to build solutions that addresses many challenges that are prevalent.
basics.headline: Software Engineer | MS in Software Engineering | JavaScript, C#, NodeJS, .Net, AWS | Full stack

work.name: Siemens Industry Software
work.summary:
Designed and developed Cloud based UI application using Angular-9, TypeScript, and other JavaScript libraries
and CSS frameworks (Bootstrap).
Participated in the whole process of initial design review, planning and implementation of the product and
have knowledge about processes involved in Agile Software methodology such as iteration planning, review.
Designed and developed REST APIs in NodeJS and .NET Core for user authentication, data management,
sending data through web sockets, and communicating with AWS cloud services such as S3, EC2, lambda
function, DynamoDB.
Other responsibilities and daily activities include collaborating with DevOps team for deployment issues on
cloud, writing unit test cases, conferring with the product owner, and UX expert to ensure the user story meets
functional, and performance requirements, performing code reviews.

work.name: Tech Mahindra Pvt Ltd
work.summary:
Worked on installation, configuration and troubleshooting of IBM WebSphere Application Server and Web
Servers IBM HTTP/Apache.
Developed an interactive web application for AT&T that displays the application server configuration
information and health status by running automated scripts present on the server.
Implemented backend code in Node JS for session management, authentication and spawning a child process
to execute the scripts.

interests.name: sports - skipping, playing table tennis, watching  cricket, working out in gym

certificates.name: AWS Certified Developer – Associate
certificates.summary: AWS Certified Developer – Associate is intended for anyone with one or more years of hands-on experience developing and maintaining an AWS-based application

references.name: Zachi Mann
references.reference:
In the last 2 years Koteswar was a developer working on a cloud based engineering solution in my team, involving many technologies such as Angular, Node.js, .NET, 3D programming, and AWS. 
Koteswar is a quick learner, who always strives to get a complete understanding of all technologies and problems at hand. He is awesome! team-player and invaluable team member. 
I was deeply saddened when he decided to leave the team, but on the other side filled with joy as Kotesh was leaving us in order to pursue higher education in the US :) 
Anyone who will know him in the future as a team member or otherwise can consider himself lucky!
